bcbioRnaseq
  • Reference

Plot Total Reads

Plot Total Reads

plotTotalReads(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioRNADataSet
plotTotalReads(object, ...)

# S4 method for data.frame
plotTotalReads(object, interestingGroup = "sampleName",
  passLimit = 20L, warnLimit = 10L, flip = TRUE)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
interestingGroup

Optional. Category to use to group samples (color and shape). If unset, this is automatically determined by the metadata set inside the bcbioRNADataSet.
passLimit

Threshold to plot pass color marker.
warnLimit

Threshold to plot warning color marker.
flip

Flip X and Y axes.

Value

ggplot.

See also

Other Quality Control Plots: plot53Bias, plotCountDensity, plotCountsPerGene, plotExonicMappingRate, plotGeneDetectionSaturation, plotGenesDetected, plotIntronicMappingRate, plotMappedReads, plotMappingRate, plotRRNAMappingRate

Examples

data(bcb)

# bcbioRNADataSet
plotTotalReads(bcb)

# data.frame
metrics(bcb) %>% plotTotalReads(metrics)
#> Error in as.name(interestingGroup): (list) object cannot be coerced to type 'symbol'
